consentModal.label: Cookies
consentModal.title: Intake24 uses cookies!
consentModal.description: We use necessary cookies to provide essential features, functionality cookies to remember user preferences and analytics cookies to help us to understand and improve user experience.

sections.title: Functionality cookies
sections.description: Functionality cookies allow the website to remember information that changes the way the website behaves or looks, like your preferred language or the region that you are in.

body.name: ^it24(a|s)_
body.desc: Stores user preferences and settings for the websites.

sections.title: Analytics and statistical cookies
sections.description: Analytics and statistical cookies help us to understand how visitors use the websites to improve the services offered. Information is collected and stored anonymously.
